seats_honda_accord_2008: front seats much more comfortable. ride is very good, but seats are just a little firm.
performance_honda_accord_2008: the car is great, both with styling and performance. engine performance is very lacking.
price_amazon_kindle: you can sort the kindle books by price and find many more free books. savings trump purchase price with kindle's low book price advantages.
location_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: the hotel is in a great location on fisherman's wharf. the staff are so friendly and the hotel is in a great location.
features_windows7: i really like about windows 7 are the new and improved features it offers. the new finder desktop windows features are awkward working versions of what mac os x has had for a couple of years.
speed_windows7: it is as fast as vista if not faster. it boots faster and shuts down faster than xp. also it starts faster and runs things faster. also it starts faster and runs things faster.
navigation_amazon_kindle: navigation is much easier with the 5, way button. 3 easy page turns and navigation.
updates_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: easy to connect to garmin to download your updated map. once receiving the unit, you get one map update download which must be used within 60 days.
sound_ipod_nano_8gb: the video quality is very good, and the sound quality is very good.
service_swissotel_hotel_chicago: the hotel was great, the service was wonderful and room service was quick. swissotel offered all the services extras.
quality_toyota_camry_2007: i bought the camry because of toyota reliability and quality. the fit and finish quality is poor.
food_holiday_inn_london: the food was good and the service was very good. there are a couple pubs, a great patisserie and even fast food restaurants within a block. there were also a more expensive english breakfast with many hot foods which was included in some room prices.
rooms_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: though small, the rooms were clean and nicely decorated. the staff was friendly and helpful, the beds were comfortable.
eyesight-issues_amazon_kindle: 8 e, ink display is easy to read and doesn't strain your eyes. it is also very easy on the eyes.
transmission_toyota_camry_2007: toyota has a fix for the accelerator hesitation and transmission problem. the transmission shifts smooth at all speeds.
staff_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: staff are friendly and helpful. hotel staff were friendly and helpful.
directions_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the voice prompted turn by turn directions make it easy to get from one place to another without having to look up at the gps. it has worked well for local driving giving accurate directions for roads and streets.
video_ipod_nano_8gb: easy to use, video camera, radio, size, sound quality. ipod nano even better with video camera.
bathroom_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: the rooms were nice, very comfy bed and very clean bathroom. plenty of room in the bathroom.
satellite_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the gps unit takes very quickly locks on to satellite signals, tracks very well and when you miss a turn or do something unexpected, recalculates a new route very quickly.
price_holiday_inn_london: good hotel for the price and location. for the price and location, this was a very great hotel. but would stay again if the price was right due to the excellent location.
interior_honda_accord_2008: the interior and exterior look great. the interior design is roomy and very comfortable.
mileage_honda_accord_2008: the car is getting great gas mileage even though i have only been driving it 2 weeks.
comfort_honda_accord_2008: the accord has looks, comfort, great ride and reliability. at 6'5 it is very comfortable.
staff_swissotel_chicago: staff at the front desk were very helpful and friendly.
screen_ipod_nano_8gb: the mic and camera are great, speaker is great for video playback or bedtime movie watching. the screen is now even bigger and the device is the same size but lighter than the 4th gen nano.
speed_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: it even tells you the speed limit on most roads. it even tells you the speed limit on most roads.
size_asus_netbook_1005ha: the keyboard is just the right size. his full sized laptop dies after about 2 hours of use.
display_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the 255w has a really clear display that's easy to see in any light. it posts speed limit signs of major roads flush left on the screen.
gas_mileage_toyota_camry_2007: it gets great gas mileage. would like to see better gas mileage too.
service_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: the maid service was excellent and the food was excellent. the hotel room was average although the service was good.
battery-life_ipod_nano_8gb: it is easy to use and has great battery life. i love this ipod except for the battery life.
performance_netbook_1005ha: the small size makes it very easy to carry compared to a standard laptop. the wireless performance is great, and the speed and performance using various wi, fi connections was better than i expected it to be.
voice_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the voice prompted turn by turn directions make it easy to get from one place to another without having to look up at the gps. the voice is clear and easy to understand.
battery-life_netbook_1005ha: the battery life last almost 4 hours with contine use. the battery charger charges in no time.
battery-life_amazon_kindle: plus the kindle 2's battery life is 4 days longer per charge. you can't replace the battery because of the ipod, like fixed backing.
screen_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the screen is very bright and easy to see with direct sunlight and at night time. we love the spoken street names and the wide screen.
keyboard_netbook_1005ha: the keyboard is really easy to get used to. the touchpad feels great, the boot up was fast, keyboard feels comfortable.
comfort_toyota_camry_2007: this car is easy to drive, great gas mileage and comfortable. front seats aren't comfortable on long trip.
screen_netbook_1005ha: i'm still getting used to the small screen. the screen is sharp and bright. the keyboard was large enough to be comfortable to type on.
interior_toyota_camry_2007: the interior is nice and roomy and the exterior design is beautiful. the plastic interior looks and feels cheap.
room_holiday_inn_london: the room was small, but clean. the rooms were very clean and the bathroom was good for a london hotel.
free_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: morning coffee and biscotti was a nice touch as well as the all you can drink free wine hour in the evening. free wifi in your room, and the free wine reception in the evenings was great.
buttons_amazon_kindle: the buttons are not hard to press at all. you can hold the buttons on the edge and not turn pages.
accuracy_garmin_nuvi_255W_gps: the only glitch i have found so far is that the speed limits are not 100% accurate. the gps, amazingly, is able to very accurately tell you how fast your vehicle is moving.
fonts_amazon_kindle: easy on the eyes, font size can be changed and the book will even read to you if you want it too.
rooms_swissotel_chicago: the hotel and rooms were very clean. great location nice rooms loved the swissotel!
parking_bestwestern_hotel_sfo: at the hotel, it is valet only parking. parking was $45 per night with tax, but that includes in and out privileges.
food_swissotel_chicago: the hotel is advertised to have multiple restaurants, but that was not the case either. the only option for dinner is the palms restaurant.
service_holiday_inn_london: the food is excellent and the service great. the food is excellent and the service great.
location_holiday_inn_london: the location of the hotel is great because it's about a block from the gloucester road tube station which is on several tube lines.
